item.description:
Get into a new YOU and start dancing Salsa Today! The Boston Salsa Meetup is comprised mostly of beginner to intermediate dancers, but there are many seasoned dancers always ready to help. We schedule meetup outings in the Boston and Cambridge area, and rest assured all settings are in a friendly, welcoming environment.

If you've never danced before, we try to schedule outings where you can attend beginner lessons to get started. There is no need to feel nervous about joining us. Visit our "About Us" page to learn more about the group or get information on Boston Clubs and Instructors. And drop by the calendar and join us at the next event! Feel free to email us with any questions you may have! And see you at the next meetup outing! -- The Boston Salsa Meetup Team
item.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group
